title: Do you think there has ever been a politician who has never lied? - Quora

response.answer_text: Have YOU ever lied? Well, politicians are people and everyone has probably lied, at least once, even if they are generally an honest person. (Actually, Jesus is the only one who never lied, but then He was both God and Man, so He had an advantage.) Since politicians are people with egos who are subject to political scrutiny and prefer to make themselves look good to their constituents, even when some decisions they have made may be questionable, they are highly tempted to make themselves look good and their opponents look bad. So, even if they don’t out and out “lie” they likely have twisted the truth to their advantage.

Question: Do you think there has ever been a politician who has never lied? Short answer is NO. Long answer: All politicians lie, but you can have politicians that lie so little that it becomes a none issue. Historically Abraham Lincoln and George Washington were known for being very honest. If you look at current politicians, you could say Bernie Sanders is honest, you might not agree with his solutions, but he is honest about what he wants. Obama was also fairly honest, but for me he is on the border of what I would call an honest politician. Lately American politics have turned rather ugly and partisan, so it is difficult today to point at a truly honest politician. So in conclusion you should not worry so much on IF a politician lies, but more on HOW MUCH do they lie.

If there is one, I would say it is Jimmy Carter. He remained convicted that he saw a UFO, even after he was president. When asked in a playboy interview, he said he “lusted in his heart” at times and that was met with total distain . Carter thinks very carefully about what he says and doesn’t pull any punches. He is a man of deep religion, and it matters to him that he is in integrity.

Thanks for the question, Diane. I’ll answer it like this. Personal Life: No, I don’t believe it’s possible. It’s pretty much impossible for humans not to lie, even once, we all have slipped up in this regard. Political Life: All politicians promise things that they know they can’t deliver on during campaign season in order to win the votes of the state they’re campaigning in. Some politicians want to do what’s best for the country and fail in one or two terms to bring to pass what they claimed they could. And some politicians have no plans on doing anything that they said they would.

In this question you are saying is there anyone without the flaw of lying in them. Good luck finding someone that does not have that flaw let alone in a group of several thousand that represent you.

It could be reasonably asserted that Mohandas Karamachand Gandhi never lied, but he never ran for office. It could be asserted that his being the father of his country makes him a pol. I’m advised that the George Washington anecdote where he says,” I cannot tell a lie. I cut down the cherry tree.” is apocryphal.

Since this is a question of history, we know that none of the Prophets was a liar. Jesus Christ was an extremely noble personality and never lied. Prophet Muhammad was given the title of Sadiq which means the truthful, much before he preached Islam. He also exercised the powers of a political leader but he never lied.
